name: Music RPG (SquidMaker, JaKayne, redemer19, SkulGurl, PHxii)
name_original: Music RPG (SquidMaker, JaKayne, redemer19, SkulGurl, PHxii)
description:
Music RPG is a game joining RPG mechanics to music games. Time your actions right with the keys in time with the beat and go against a variety of rivals!  

THIS IS MORE OF A PROOF OF CONCEPT. THERE ARE NO FULL ON WIN/LOSE STATES. REFRESH IF YOU ARE STUCK.

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Controls:

W or Up Arrow - Attack

A or Left Arrow - Heal

D or Right Arrow - Shield

Credits: 

Squid Maker - Game Design, Concept Idea -  https://twitter.com/PixelSquid_

PHxii - Programmer - https://twitter.com/PHxii256

Skul Gurl - Music and Sound Effects - https://twitter.com/SkulGurlDana

redemer19 - Character Artist - https://itch.io/profile/redemer19

Jakayne - Unity Assistance, Play Tester - https://itch.io/profile/jakayne
